summary: The annual Xmas lunch/party at a Danish auto shop follows tradition. The employees all get drunk and do crazy things.
cast: Thomas Voss|Julie R. Ølgaard|Dick Kaysø|Anders W. Berthelsen|Mick Øgendahl|Søren Malling|Kim Bodnia|Thure Lindhardt|Martin Brygmann|Anne-Grethe Bjarup Riis|Kurt Ravn|Ghita Nørby|Helena Christensen|Camille-Catrine Rommedahl|Baard Owe|Janus Dissing Rathke|Kristian Ibler|Florian Fastina|Sebastian Jessen|William Salicath|Jonas Michelsen|David Petersen|Rolf Rasmussen
title: Julefrokosten
